venue.name: Riverview Restaurant at the Hudson Portuguese Club

item.description:
Homemade Wine and Portuguese ethnic appetizer tasting & contest followed by dancing.

7:00 pm to 9:00 pm - Tasting
9:00 pm to 12:00 pm - Dancing with DJ Nilton

Everyone over 21 years old is welcome.

Tickets
$15.00 (Pre-purchased)
$20.00 (Purchased at door)


Taste, savor and enjoy home made wines, appetizers and “biscoitos” made by contestants.

Interested in participating in thewin e, appetizer or “biscoitos” contest, please email Luisa Fontes at secretary@hudsonportugueseclub.org .

Tickets can be purchased either at the Hudson Portuguese Club, Central Street Market or from the following individuals: Luisa Fontes, Maria Leandres, Lurdes Melo, Danny Fontes, Estrela Chaves, Emily Braga or Roberto Braga.
All wines and “biscoitos” will be presented Anonymously.

*********************************************
I know this is a little out the way for some of you. I visited this club early this year and the grounds are beautiful. The landscaping is amazing. It is not only a Portuguese restaurant. In fact the restaurant is a very small part of this club. The grounds contains several function halls, a bar, a gym, outdoor patio, and even a shrine with a waterfall/river dedicated to the Lady of Fatima.
